thread.title: Target Shoppers! HUGE Savings on Soda (TODAY ONLY) = Coca-Cola 8-Packs Only $1.67 + More
thread.title_full: Target Shoppers! HUGE Savings on Soda (TODAY ONLY) = Coca-Cola 8-Packs Only $1.67 + More

author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: Target Shoppers! HUGE Savings on Soda (TODAY ONLY) = Coca-Cola 8-Packs Only $1.67 + More
text:
Target Shoppers! TODAY ONLY, you can save 50% off ALL 12-Pack and 8-Pack Sodas with the Cartwheel Savings Offer found here . Please note this offer excludes mini packs and there is a limit of 10 items per guest. Keep in mind – soda prices may vary by region.

Even better, if you’re a fan of Coca-Cola products, 12-Pack cans and 8-Pack Bottles are on sale 3/$12 or $4.99 each – soda prices may vary by region .
Coca-Cola Products 8-pk Bottles 3/$12 or $4.99 each 
Buy 3 = $12
Use the 50% off ALL 12-Pack and 8-Pack Sodas Cartwheel Savings Offer – will deduct $6
Pay $6
Get $1 cash back via Checkout 51 when you buy 1 Coca-Cola 6 or 8-pks (limit 1)
Final Cost $5 total – just $1.67 per 8-pk!

Coca-Cola Products 12-pk Cans 3/$12 or $4.99 each 
Buy 3 = $12
Use the 50% off ALL 12-Pack and 8-Pack Sodas Cartwheel Savings Offer – will deduct $6
Final Cost $6 total – $2 each!

12-Pack Soda $4.99 – most varieties 
Use the 50% off ALL 12-Pack and 8-Pack Sodas Cartwheel Savings Offer – will deduct $2.50
Final Cost $2.49!
